com.explodingpixels.painter
Interface Painter<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
ButtonStatePainter, ButtonStatePainter.DummyPainter, CompoundPainter, FocusStatePainter, GradientPainter, GradientWithBorderPainter, ImagePainter, RectanglePainter, ScrollThumbImagePainter
public interface Painter<T>

An interface that allows painting to be delegated. The implementation of this interface will be called during the painting process of the given objectToPaint.

Method Summary
 void paint(Graphics2D graphics, T objectToPaint, int width, int height)
          Renders to the given Graphics2D.
 

Method Detail

paint

void paint(Graphics2D graphics,
           T objectToPaint,
           int width,
           int height)
Renders to the given Graphics2D. The supplied graphics context may be modified - it's state need not be restored upon completion of painting.

Parameters:
graphics - the graphics context to paint into. It's state need not be restored. Will not be null.
objectToPaint - the object to be painted.
width - the width within the object to paint.
height - the height within the object to paint.
